title: Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area: Public Involvement
body: Public Involvement       The park invites your input on various plans from time to time. Plans that are available for public comment will be listed on this webpage. Check back for frequent updates! Keep in mind projects have specific "Comment Periods" during which comments are considered. Comments submitted too late may not be reviewed, so always submit comments during the applicable dates Planning, Environment and Public Comment (PEPC) The National Park Service prepares a variety of planning and environmental documents to help guide it in managing park resources. These documents can range from site-specific impact analyses on facility locations to broader park-wide plans for future use and management of a park.  Planning, Environment and Public Comment website contains all of the currently active plans and environmental documents for the National Park Service. Do you have a question or concern? Please share your ideas on how the Lakeshore can best be managed so as to be preserved unimpaired for future generations.
